meta_description: The Richmond Art Center teaches art classes and workshops to adults and kids in ceramics, metals, jewelry making, enameling, photography, mixed media, encaustics, drawing, painting, screen printing, fiber arts and collage. Our exhibits showcase emerging and established artists, including Richard Diebenkorn, Jasper Johns, Jay Defeo, John Chiara and Hung Lui â€” many of whom launched their careers at the Art Center. Located in the East Bay of the San Francisco Bay Area, an easy jaunt from San Francisco, Berkeley, Oakland and more.
